verses.verse: Then he brought me <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2435>outward<s%> <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> which <S%H6437>looketh<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and <S%H1931>it<s%> was <S%H5462>shut.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me; <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5462>shut,<s%> it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall enter <S%H935>in<s%> by it; <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> hath entered <S%H935>in<s%> by it, therefore it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5462>shut.<s%>

It <S%H853>is<s%> for the <S%H5387>prince;<s%> the <S%H5387>prince,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> in it to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> he shall <S%H935>enter<s%> by the <S%H4480>way<s%> <S%H1870><s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of that <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> by the <S%H4480>way<s%> <S%H1870><s%> of the same.

Then <S%H935>brought<s%> he me the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1004>house:<s%> and I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> mark <S%H7760>well,<s%> <S%H3820><s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> with thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with thine <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H1696>say<s%> unto thee concerning <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8451>laws<s%> thereof; and mark <S%H7760>well<s%> <S%H3820><s%> the entering <S%H3996>in<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> with <S%H3605>every<s%> going <S%H4161>forth<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4805>rebellious,<s%> even <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> O ye <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> let it <S%H7227>suffice<s%> you <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations,<s%>

In that ye have <S%H935>brought<s%> into my sanctuary <S%H1121>strangers,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> to <S%H1961>be<s%> in my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> to <S%H2490>pollute<s%> it, <S%H853>even<s%> my <S%H1004>house,<s%> when ye <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3899>bread,<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and they have <S%H6565>broken<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> because <S%H413>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>

And ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of mine holy <S%H6944>things:<s%> but ye have <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of my <S%H4931>charge<s%> in my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for yourselves.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1121>stranger,<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart,<s%> nor <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1121>stranger<s%> <S%H5236><s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are gone away <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me, when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H8582>astray,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> went <S%H8582>astray<s%> away <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H1544>idols;<s%> they shall even <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

Yet they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8334>ministers<s%> in my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> having <S%H6486>charge<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H8334>ministering<s%> <S%H853><s%> to the <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H7819>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto them.

Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> they ministered <S%H8334>unto<s%> <S%H853><s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and <S%H1961>caused<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4383>fall<s%> into <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> come <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, to do the office of a <S%H3547>priest<s%> unto me, nor to come <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of my holy <S%H6944>things,<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the most <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944><s%> place: but they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H3639>shame,<s%> and their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed.<s%>

But I will <S%H5414>make<s%> them <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> thereof, and for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> therein.

But the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H8582>astray<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> me, <S%H1992>they<s%> shall come <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto me, and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto me the <S%H2459>fat<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%>

They <S%H1992><s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> shall come <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H7979>table,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto me, and they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4931>charge.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that when they enter <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> they shall be clothed <S%H3847>with<s%> <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments;<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6785>wool<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, while they <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and <S%H1004>within.<s%>

They shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H6287>bonnets<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H6593>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H4975>loins;<s%> they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2296>gird<s%> themselves with any thing that causeth <S%H3154>sweat.<s%>

And when they go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> even <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> they shall put <S%H6584>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H899>garments<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H8334>ministered,<s%> and <S%H5117>lay<s%> them in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> and they shall put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H899>garments;<s%> and they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with their <S%H899>garments.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they <S%H1548>shave<s%> their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> suffer their <S%H6545>locks<s%> to grow <S%H7971>long;<s%> they shall only <S%H3697>poll<s%> <S%H3697><s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> when they <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they <S%H3947>take<s%> for their <S%H802>wives<s%> a <S%H490>widow,<s%> nor her that is put <S%H1644>away:<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H1330>maidens<s%> of the <S%H4480>seed<s%> <S%H2233><s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or a <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H4480>priest<s%> <S%H3548><s%> before.

And they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> the difference <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and <S%H2455>profane,<s%> and cause them to <S%H3045>discern<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean.<s%>

And <S%H5921>in<s%> <S%H7379>controversy<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in <S%H8199>judgment;<s%> and they shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> it according to my <S%H4941>judgments:<s%> and they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H8451>laws<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> mine <S%H4150>assemblies;<s%> and they shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

And they shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H120>person<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves: <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> for <S%H1>father,<s%> or for <S%H517>mother,<s%> or for <S%H1121>son,<s%> or for <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> for <S%H251>brother,<s%> or for <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> hath <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>husband,<s%> they may defile <S%H2930>themselves.<s%>
And <S%H310>after<s%> he is <S%H2893>cleansed,<s%> they shall <S%H5608>reckon<s%> unto him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H935>goeth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> unto them for an <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am their <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> and ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H272>possession<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am their <S%H272>possession.<s%>

They <S%H1992><s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and the trespass <S%H817>offering;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> dedicated <S%H2764>thing<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> theirs.

And the <S%H7225>first<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> things, and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of <S%H3605>all,<s%> of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> sort of your <S%H8641>oblations,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H3548>priest's:<s%> ye shall also <S%H5414>give<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough,<s%> that he may cause the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> thine <S%H1004>house.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of any <S%H3605>thing<s%> that is dead of <S%H5038>itself,<s%> or <S%H2966>torn,<s%> <S%H4480>whether<s%> it be <S%H5775>fowl<s%> <S%H4480>or<s%> <S%H929>beast.<s%>
